title: Channel 10 confirms premiere date for I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here
text:
Channel 10 has confirmed I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here will premiere on the 5th of January, 2020.

Taking to Instagram, the show's official page revealed the program will air next year with Julia Morris and Chris Brown making a return as hosts.

'We're baaaaaack! This season the jungle is filled with more surprises than Julia Morris has lion puns,' the post read alongside a photo of the duo.

It's official! Channel 10 has confirmed I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here will premiere on the 5th of January, 2020 (pictured hosts Chris Brown and Julia Morris)

'Join Julia and Chris Brown for another round of mayhem, I'm A Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! is coming January 5TH to Channel 10.'

The celebrity cast is yet to be revealed but fans shared their excitement after having eagerly awaited the show's return.

'Thank goodness I can give my kid a count down clock now. She has been hanging to find out when you guys are back,' one person wrote.

'We're back!' The show's official Instagram page revealed the program will air next year with veteran hosts Julia Morris and Chris Brown (pictured) returning

'Whaaaaattttttt, we have to wait until then!!!! Can't wait,' another added.

'Omg I can not wait for this,' one person wrote. Another said: 'Cannot wait! Two of my favourite people on telly.'

I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here will be in it's sixth season.

'Can't wait': Fans flocked to Instagram to share their excitement after eagerly awaiting the show's returns

Last year, former Today gossip correspondent Richard Reid was crowed the winner after beating Gogglebox star Yvie Jones.

After his name was called out, the entertainment reporter was absolutely ecstatic and screamed in glee.

He then ran up to the podium to sit on his throne, his arms in the air, wailing with joy as fireworks and confetti exploded around him.
description: Channel 10 has confirmed I'm A Celebrity... Get Me Out Of Here will premiere on the 5th of January, 2020.
authors: Mary Mrad For Daily Mail Australia
